lead_paragraph: Beating the best field in golf, whether in a major or a World Golf Championship, often offers essentially a free pass to the P.G.A. But not all Europeans want to take the U.S. tour up on its offer.
snippet: Beating the best field in golf, whether in a major or a World Golf Championship, often offers essentially a free pass to the P.G.A. But not all Europeans want to take the U.S. tour up on its offer.
